## Details

- Date: 19-22 May 2026
- Location: Estrel Congress Center Berlin, Germany
- Registration: <https://2026.bibliocon.de/registrierung/>
- Event page: <https://2026.bibliocon.de/>

## About

BiblioCon 2026 is the largest library congress in the German-speaking region and is held under the theme "Analog trifft Algorithmus".

NAIF participates with a poster contribution focused on interoperability and the improvement of academic metadata quality across institutional and national infrastructures.
